item.title: MdHMA5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Md03G1182600 Gene Symbol: MdHMA5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdWRKY11 improves copper tolerance by directly promoting the expression of the copper transporter gene MdHMA5.

item.title: TaWRKY74
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5D02G190800 Gene Symbol: TaWRKY74 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 74 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: TaWRKY74 participates copper tolerance through regulation of TaGST1 expression and GSH content in wheat.
